5a13876a8bf55085c847fcab.description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to recieve gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcab.name: Friend of the Forest

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcba.description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 2% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds for massive damage in an area around the victim.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcba.name: Blaze

5a1386428bf55085c847d514.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
5a1386428bf55085c847d514.name: Defensive Ball Curl
5a1386428bf55085c847d514.tooltip:
Rammus enters a defensive formation for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}/{{ f2 }}) but becoming slowed by {{ e5 }}%.

During this time, Spiked Shell deals {{ e4 }}% damage and also deals its damage to enemies that basic attack Rammus.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Defensive Ball Curl on cooldown.
Casting Defensive Ball Curl cancels Powerball and puts it on cooldown.

5a1386438bf55085c847d559.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt nearby enemies.
5a1386438bf55085c847d559.name: Shield of Durand
5a1386438bf55085c847d559.tooltip:
Passive: After not taking damage for {{ e6 }} seconds Galio gains a shield that absorbs {{ f3 }} magic damage.

First Cast: Galio starts to charge, gaining {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})% Damage Reduction but slowing himself by {{ e3 }}%.

Second Cast: Galio taunts nearby enemy champions for {{ e4 }} to {{ e7 }} seconds and refreshes the Damage Reduction for {{ e8 }} seconds. Taunt duration and radius increase with charge time.

Shield of Durand's charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control.

5a1386408bf55085c847d477.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.
5a1386408bf55085c847d477.name: Tiger Stance
5a1386408bf55085c847d477.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will perform a Tiger Strike, dealing bonus {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over {{ e5 }} seconds.

If a target is affected by Tiger Strike, a new application of Tiger Strike will deal the remaining damage instantly.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

5a1386438bf55085c847d558.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
5a1386438bf55085c847d558.name: Winds of War
5a1386438bf55085c847d558.tooltip:
Galio fires two windblasts that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

When the windblasts meet, they combine into a giant tornado that deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2*3 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of enemies' maximum Health (max {{ e4 }} vs. monsters) as magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1386408bf55085c847d47a.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
5a1386408bf55085c847d47a.name: Phoenix Stance
5a1386408bf55085c847d47a.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after burns enemies in front of him, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d234.description: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d234.name: Justice Punch
5a1385df8bf55085c847d234.tooltip: Galio lunges forward with a mighty blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies and knocking them into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds. Galio will stop upon hitting a champion or terrain.

5a1386448bf55085c847d58d.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
5a1386448bf55085c847d58d.name: Permafrost
5a1386448bf55085c847d58d.tooltip:
Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions and large monsters.

Active: Target enemy with 4 stacks of Frost takes {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is stunned for {{ e1 }} second(s).

An enemy stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for {{ f2 }} seconds.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d266.description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d266.name: Corrosive Charge
5a1385df8bf55085c847d266.tooltip: Urgot fires an explosive charge, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing enemies hit by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

5a1386448bf55085c847d594.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
5a1386448bf55085c847d594.name: Conquering Sands
5a1386448bf55085c847d594.tooltip:
Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a {{ e2 }}% slow for 1 second.

Enemies hit by multiple Sand Soldiers will not take additional damage.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5ab.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5ab.name: Parrrley
5a1386448bf55085c847d5ab.tooltip:
Fires a bullet that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (can crit and applies on-hit effects).

If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders {{ e2 }} bonus Gold and {{ e5 }} Silver Serpents. (Trade Silver Serpents at the shop to upgrade Cannon Barrage).

5a1384558bf55085c8479620.description:
+80 Ability Power
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. Refunds 25% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +8 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast or Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds).

Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana.
5a1384558bf55085c8479620.name: Archangel's Staff

5a13846c8bf55085c84797b1.description:
+60 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: +10% Heal and Shield Power
UNIQUE Passive: +8% Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive: Whenever you heal or shield an ally, you and your ally gain 20% - 35% Attack Speed and your attacks deal an additional 20 - 35 on-hit magic damage for 6 seconds.

This does not include regeneration effects. Bonus effects are based on target's level.
5a13846c8bf55085c84797b1.name: Ardent Censer

5a1384558bf55085c84796b6.description:
+80 Ability Power
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. Refunds 25% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +12 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast or Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds).

Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana.
5a1384558bf55085c84796b6.name: Archangel's Staff (Quick Charge)

5a1384558bf55085c847961e.description:
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Refunds 15% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants 4 maximum Mana on spell cast or Mana expenditure (up to 2 times per 8 seconds).

Caps at +750 Mana.
5a1384558bf55085c847961e.name: Tear of the Goddess

5a1384558bf55085c8479675.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% of maximum Mana. Refunds 15% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +4 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each basic attack, spell cast or Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds).

Transforms into Muramana at +750 Mana.
5a1384558bf55085c8479675.name: Manamune

5a1384558bf55085c84796bd.description:
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Refunds 15% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants 6 maximum Mana on spell cast or Mana expenditure (up to 2 times per 8 seconds).

Caps at +750 Mana.
5a1384558bf55085c84796bd.name: Tear of the Goddess (Quick Charge)

5a1384558bf55085c8479685.description:
+90 Armor
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+400 Mana

UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.
5a1384558bf55085c8479685.name: Frozen Heart

5a1384558bf55085c84796d6.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% of maximum Mana. Refunds 15% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +6 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each basic attack, spell cast or Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds).

Transforms into Muramana at +750 Mana.
5a1384558bf55085c84796d6.name: Manamune (Quick Charge)
